segments.title: PATIENTPOP, A TEBRA COMPANY
body: Drove product roadmap with cross-team stakeholders including product managers, reducing feature creep by five unnecessary user stories and enabling on-time delivery of management’s top epic six weeks ahead of initial estimate
Requested by CTO to step in and provide cross-functional leadership to stabilize new team, leading cross-team collaboration to launch a foundational roadmap feature in six weeks

Identified need for reduced code duplication and launched three products that met requirements sourced from interviews with department engineers, saving over 12,000 lines of redundant code across 12 microservice projects

Designed microservice project quick-start template and implemented product feedback resulting from testing with department engineers, shortening project launch times for three other teams by 10 weeks total

Partnered with third-party website design team in Israel to launch next-generation website platform, enabling sales to new segment comprising 40% of market and leading to the company’s acquisition of the vendor

Guided team of two junior engineers through comprehensive system refactor, leading to on-time product launch and zero slowdown in sprint velocity when founding engineering manager departed the company

Launched suite of online appointment scheduling widgets and implemented customer feature requests, boosting appointments booked through key widget by 60% and customer adoption by 17% in a single quarter
Established weekly coding book club, introducing concepts and best practices of Clean Code to a group of five engineers

segments.title: ORACLE
body: Served as first team Scrum Master and orchestrated ceremonies (standup, backlog refinement, planning, review, retrospective), lowering engineering manager workload by five hours weekly and accelerating backlog refinement by 40%
Upgraded product quality by leading team code standards and reviews: developed with team a set of code standards and test mock frameworks to achieve department-high test coverage of over 90%

Delivered SDK features in tandem with cross-functional and multinational team located across Redwood Shores, Canada, Spain, the Philippines, and the Czech Republic, empowering over 500 Oracle NetSuite partner-developed applications

Identified department need for streamlined recruiting criteria, proposed solutions to stakeholders including VP of Engineering, and tested new criteria in dozens of interviews resulting in two engineers and one product manager hired
Mentored three new graduate engineers through training covering code standards, leading to the promotion of all three

segments.title: NETSUITE
body: Designed and implemented, using Java and SQL, server-side API and client-side tool that customers use to convert ERP and CRM account customizations built under old bundle framework to newly-released application development framework
Designed and implemented, using Java, many feature additions to NetSuite Eclipse IDE plugin that enable customers to take full advantage of newly-released application development framework

segments.title: EXOSITE
body: Updated and improved libraries for company APIs in various languages including C#, C++, Python, Go, and Java
Designed, developed, and programmed Internet of Things demos working in Arduino IDE, cloud-based Lua scripts, and JavaScript
Answered support tickets by debugging customer Internet of Things solutions
